santa_wishlist.name: Santa's Wishlist
santa_wishlist.description: Register Christmas wishes with Santa for all ages.

register.label: Register wish
register.help: Store a new wish for Santa's review. Provide the child's name, optional age and the wish text.

list.label: Show wishes
list.help: Show every wish saved for the specified child. Both name and age are required for privacy.

trending.label: Trending statistics
trending.help: View the most requested presents this season based on recent registrations.

messages.missing_name: Please provide a name before registering a wish.
messages.missing_wish: Write down the wish Santa should receive.
messages.missing_age: Please provide the age to look up recorded wishes.
messages.wish_too_short: The wish needs to be at least three characters long.
messages.invalid_age: Age must be a whole number between 1 and 150.
messages.unknown_action: Unknown action '{action}'. Available actions: register, list, trending.
messages.ledger_unavailable: Santa's ledger is unavailable right now. Please try again shortly.
